feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.9: Public Gateway Bug Fix, Language Strings & Dependency Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix Push Expiration bug with Public Gateway (#2546) Thanks @Viajaz!

:rocket: Features

  • Fix Workers Count: Set default count of 2 (#2545) @pglombardo
  • Latest Language Strings (#2530) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.44.0 to 0.45.0 (#2543) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.163.0 to 1.164.0 (#2542) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.91.0 to 1.92.0 (#2541) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-rails from 2.26.1 to 2.26.2 (#2540) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.206.0 to 3.207.0 (#2539) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump faraday from 1.10.3 to 1.10.4 (#2538) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump turbo-rails from 2.0.9 to 2.0.10 (#2537) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump puma from 6.4.2 to 6.4.3 (#2536) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump turbo-rails from 2.0.7 to 2.0.9 (#2534) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.162.0 to 1.163.0 (#2533) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.976.0 to 1.977.0 (#2532) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.45.9

..and go to http://localhost:5100

  • Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.10: Better TestMailer with checks for local mail servers
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix: Better TestMailer with checks for local mail server. (#2554) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.11: Fixes on Upload Limits, Push Deletion & Language Codes
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix: Better upload count check (#2586) @pglombardo
  • Fix: Deleting Push with Last View yields Error 500 (#2585) @pglombardo
  • Enabled Language Codes: Ensure Array (#2579) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.40.0 to 1.40.1 (#2584) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump debase-ruby_core_source from 3.3.1 to 3.3.5 (#2583) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.983.0 to 1.984.0 (#2581) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump jwt from 2.9.1 to 2.9.3 (#2582) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.166.0 to 1.167.0 (#2576) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.982.0 to 1.983.0 (#2575) @dependabot

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.980.0 to 1.981.0 (#2570) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump sentry-ruby from 5.19.0 to 5.20.1 (#2569) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rexml from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 (#2568) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.209.0 to 3.209.1 (#2563) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump irb from 1.14.0 to 1.14.1 (#2567) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.979.0 to 1.980.0 (#2566) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.978.0 to 1.979.0 (#2562) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump sqlite3 from 2.0.4 to 2.1.0 (#2559) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.46.0: New worker container
entry.content:
The worker container is being added for future functionality. Currently it runs the background cleanup tasks. It is not required to run the application.

:memo: What’s Changed

  • New pwpush-worker Docker container (#2601) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Ruby: >=3.2 (#2598) @pglombardo
  • Simplify Secret URL bar (#2597) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.987.0 to 1.988.0 (#2607) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-performance from 1.21.1 to 1.22.1 (#2606) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.986.0 to 1.987.0 (#2602) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.40.1 to 1.41.0 (#2603) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump terser from 1.2.3 to 1.2.4 (#2596) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.985.0 to 1.986.0 (#2593) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump googleauth from 1.11.0 to 1.11.1 (#2591) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-cloud-env from 2.2.0 to 2.2.1 (#2590) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.984.0 to 1.985.0 (#2589) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump msgpack from 1.7.2 to 1.7.3 (#2588) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

..and go to http://localhost:5100
